q: . Additional secret documents from his years at the Pentagon will be declassified and reviewed for public release, he said. On his website he wrote that deciding to release certain papers was difficult. These documents were not designed with an eye to history as part of an authoritative archive, he wrote. . When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick says in a to-be-released statement." the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers. "We're excited about( Keon Clark )," Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Antonio Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. After helping Toronto eclipse a 20-point first-half deficit, Keon Clark watched helplessly as Allen Iverson fueled a 17-0 Philadelphia burst with 11 points, leaving the Raptors with an 89-78 deficit with 8:47 left in regulation.
